Help identify_subquadrat().

Help identify_subquadrat().

add_quadrat_and_subquadrat_from_list(df_list, ...)

Arguments

df_list

A list of dataframes
...

Arguments passed to add_subquadrat(). Importantly, this allows changing the size of the subquadrats.

See also

Other functions to prepare data to plot repulsive tags.: add_latest_tree_status, add_quadrat_to_df_list, add_subquad_limits, add_subquadrat, identify_subquadrat, prep_repulsive_tags

Examples

df_list <- toy_list[1:2]
# Extracting first quadrat and showing the head of each subquadrat
added <- add_quadrat_and_subquadrat_from_list(df_list)[[1]]
lapply(added, head)
#> [[1]]
#>    tag    lx    ly symbol quadrat subquadrat
#> 4  178 9.460 7.077     15       1          1
#> 7  920 5.341 2.272      1       1          1
